info.name: RoleMembers
info.description: Allows you to see the members of each role on a server.

changelog.title: Small Change
items: Holding control when clicking on a context menu item will now copy the role ID instead of open the popup.

changelog.title: Fully Fixed
items: Context menu item shows and works again.
Role mentions can be clicked once again.
Now only one popout will show at a time instead of infinite.
